name: zero-day-of-water2
description: This repository hosts a simple dashboard served from the `/docs` directory and a proxy for Gemini API requests.

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:agri && npm run prepare:agri
scripts.prepare:agri: mkdir -p docs/agrivoltaics/vendor && cp node_modules/react/umd/react.production.min.js docs/agrivoltaics/vendor/ && cp node_modules/react-dom/umd/react-dom.production.min.js docs/agrivoltaics/vendor/ && cp node_modules/qrcode-generator/dist/qrcode.js docs/agrivoltaics/vendor/ && cp node_modules/jspdf/dist/jspdf.umd.min.js docs/agrivoltaics/vendor/
